channel.title: Tell me everything i need 2 even start a new server
channel.description:
please tell me everything i need to even start one and il make he five ppl that help me mods on the game[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2008, 04:03:48 PM[/size][hr]i need someone to post me everything i need like websites and help me out to even start one.
i want one like boratscape or ganstascape not one i need sila or mopar for couse they dont run on my computer

item.title: Tell me everything i need 2 even start a new server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

A router
Internet

Common sense

Knowledge of making an ip at www.no-ip.com and knowledge of port forwarding on your router. and knowledge of opening a port on your firewall settings

Oh and a computer, you really need one of those

and what everyone else said xD

Read full topic

item.title: Tell me everything i need 2 even start a new server

Change the name.

Host it.

Done.
